snippet: The United States on Tuesday imposed sanctions on nine new targets, saying the entities and people targeted had supported Iran's efforts to avoid sanctions and backed the government's human rights abuses, including censorship....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Names More Iran Targets for Sanctions
headline.main: U.S. Names More Iran Targets for Sanctions

lead_paragraph: The United States on Tuesday imposed sanctions on nine new targets, saying the entities and people targeted had supported Iran's efforts to avoid sanctions and backed the government's human rights abuses, including censorship.
